English: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
Igbo: Nzukọ enweghị ike ike ụtụ ma n'ihi na enweghi ndị isi ọchịchị gọọmenti etiti maọbụ ndị omeiwu, ọ dabeere na ndị isi ọchịchị steeti, ndị anaghị enwe otu obi ọtụtụ oge ịkwado iwu ya nile.
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Igbo: Lelee nnyeàhà ahụ maka ntụziaka mgbata ọsọ enyemaka mbụ akọwapụtara maka nsi ahụ akọwapụtara.
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Igbo: ASUS Eee PC, ewepụtara ụwa niile na mbụ maka ụmụ ihe nchekwa-ego na arụmọrụ ya, wụrụ isiokwu na-ewu ewu n’Ọnwa IT Taipei 2007.
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Igbo: O wetegoro anyị ụgbọoloko, ụgbọala na ọtụtụ akụrụngwa njem dị iche iche.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Igbo: E kwuputala na na e nweela nsogbu 60 sitere na iPods ndị n'anaghị arụ ọrụ nke ọma na-ekwo oke ọkụ, nke na-ebutala ọkụ ọgbụgba isii merụrụ ndị mmadụ ahụ obere.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ha na-adị oyi karịa gburugburu ha n'ehihie ma dị ọkụ karịa n'abalị.
predictions: Ha dị jụụ karịa elu ala gbara ha gburugburu n'ehihie ma na-ekpo ọkụ n'abalị.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.
Igbo: E hiwere na akwa ahụ ga-ebido rụwa ọrụ n'uju na Septemba 2017, mgbe a na-ele anya ịrụcha ebe nnyocha nke ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka ọpụpụ na mbata nke ndị Brazili.
English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
Igbo: Bọọsụ 403 Scotturb na-eme njem mgbedum aga Sintra, na-akwụsị na Cabo da Roca.
English: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na igwe ndetị akwa adịghị adị, ma ọ bụ ọ bụrụ na ọ masịghị gị iyi sọks edere ede, mgbe ahụ ị nwere ike ịnwa iji otu igwe ịkọ ntutu, ma ọ dịrị.
English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Igbo: N'ọnwa gara aga ozi sitere n'onye ọchịchị kwadoro ọgbụgba arụkwaghịm CEP nọbu anọ dịka ihe so n'usoro omume ihe ibuje obodo na ntuli aka ọhụrụ
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Igbo: Ndị Ijipt rụrụ n’ime narị afọ atọ BCE, Oke Piramidi ahụ otu n’ime ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe ọwụwụ piramidi arụrụ ịkwanye Fero nwụrụ ugwu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Igbo:'}]
label: Omume okpomọkụ ha anaghị adịgide ka nnukwu ọgba dị n'ụwa nke na-enwe okpomọkụ na-anaghị agbanwe, mana ọ dị ka ndị a maka na ha bụkwa olulu miri emi n'ime ala," Glen Cushing kwuru, onye United States Geology Survey (USGS) Otu Astrojiọlọji na nke Mahadum Northern Arizona dị na Flagstaff, Arizona.
predictions: Omume okpomọkụ ha adịghị akwụsi ike dịka nnukwu ọgba n'ụwa nke na-echekarị okpomọkụ na-adịgide adịgide, mana ọ na-agbaso nke ahụ n'ihi na ọ bụ olulu miri emi n'ala," ka Glen Cushing nke Otu Nnyocha Ala United States (USGS) Astrogeology na nke Mahadum Northern Arizona dị na Flagstaff, Arizona kwuru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Igbo: Safari ngagharị (nke a na-akpọkwa "njem ọhịa", "safari ọrịrị", maọbụ "nzọụkwụ") gbakwunyere ịrị ugwu ruo awa ole na ole maọbụ ọtụtụ ụbọchị.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Igbo: Dika ebe ndị ahụ bụ ebe ndị mmadụ ebichabeghị etu ahụ, na mmetọ nke ọkụ ya mere anaghị abụkarị nsogbu, ị ga-enwekwa ike ịnụ ụtọ ụmụ kpakpando.
English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Igbo: N'aka nke ọzọ, ụmụ ọnọdụ okwute mmiri na sinoo bụ ihe nkịtị n'ọtụtụ mba, ma ụmụ ụgbọala na-anyagharị n'enweghị nsogbu afọ niile.
English: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
Igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị nọrọ n'ọgbọ a, i nwere ike igafe oke ala ma zere nnyocha paspọtụ.
English: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
Igbo: Suutu uwe azụmaahịa izugbe, ma ndị ọrụ ibe na-akpọ onye ọ bụla site n'aha ezinụlọ ha ma ọ bụ site n'aha ọrụ ha.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
Igbo:'}]
label: Na mba Frans, ịtụ ụtụ bụ ihe anaghị eji ike eme: ndị na-atụ ụtụ na ewezuga onwe ha n'otu ụlọ ndo, tinye akwụkwọ ebiri na ndịnihu nke na-egosi onye ha na atụrụ ụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ amachiri amachi.
predictions: Na France, ntuli aka na-emebu ka ọ bụrụ ahụmahụ nke na-eji ntakịrị nkà na ụzụ: ndị na-eme ntuli aka na-anọpụ iche n'ime ụlọ ntuli aka, tinye akwụkwọ e biri ebi nke na-egosi nhọpụta ha n'ime akwụkwọ ozi.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
Igbo: Ya mere, ọ dị ka agbakwụnyere ihe ngosi a dị ka akara njirimara naanị.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Igbo: Ugbu a, anyị nwere ụmụ oke ọnwa anọ na-arịabu ọrịa shuga mana ha anaghị arịazi ya.
English: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
Igbo: Na imaatu, ha enweghi oka, nweghi tomato, nweghi poteto, nweghi koko, na onweghi onye Rome mgbeochie deturu anu toro-toro ire.
English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
Igbo: Ọtụtụ nkọwa e nyere nkwenyesiike kenkanụzụ nwere echiche izugbe abụọ: na mmepụta nkanụzụ n'onwe ya na-agbaso usoro nke gbapụrụ iche site na nkwanye nke omenala maọbụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ya na kwa na nkanụzụ n'aka nke ya nwere "mmekpaahụ" ọ na-enye ọhaobodo nke dị adị, n'abụghị nke sitere na mmekọrịta.
English: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
Igbo: Liggins soro n’uzoụkwụ nna ya ma banye n’ọrụ ọgwụ.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
Igbo:'}]
label: Ka ndị nchịkọta nyochachara onye na-atụ ụtụ, onye na-atụ ụtụ etinye akwụkwọ ụtụ ya amachiri amachi n'ime igbe nnakọ ụtụ ma bie aka n'akwụkwọ ndị tụrụ ụtụ.
predictions: Mgbe ndị ọrụ gọọmenti gosipụtara njirimara onye ntuli aka, onye ntuli aka ahụ tụfuru akwụkwọ ntuli aka n'ime igbe ntuli aka ma binye aka na ndepụta ntuli aka.

predictions: Kemgbe afọ 1988, igbe ntuli aka ga-adị uzo uzo ka ndị na-atụ vootu na ndị na-ekiri ya nwee ike ịhụ na enweghị akwụkwọ ozi ọ bụla dị na mbido ntuli aka ahụ na enweghị akwụkwọ ozi a na-agbakwunye ma e wezụga nke ndị na-atụ vootu kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi na ndị e nyela ikike.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
Igbo: Ụmụ nri Ndị Rome Ndị mgbe ochie enwughị ike ịgụnye nri ndị batara Yurop site na Amerịka ma ọ bụ Eshịa na narị afọ ndị na-esotenu.
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Igbo: Ndị nche legidere ndị ọgbaa anya nke ọma ka ha mere nnwale njikwa ọtapịapịa nke ntụkwasị, dịka e lebara anya na nnwale ahụ ma tụlee ma ọ dị ire.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Igbo: Ọ bụghị ihe ihere: ọ dịghị iche dị n'etiti ya na mmadụ inwe egwu gbasara ihe nwere ike ime na ndụ ya nakwa enweghi mmasị n'ihe ndị ọzọ nke ọtụtụ mmadụ nwere.
English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Igbo: Maka ndị Australia, kọfị 'flat white' bụ ihe ala ọzọ. Shọt blak bụ 'espresso', cappuccino na-ebu nnukwu krim abịa (ọ bụghị froth), ha na-añụ tii na-etinyeghị mmiri ara ehi.
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Igbo: Ihe ọzọ dị iche bụ na ebe ndị ogbenye na nwanyị ahụ riri nri ha ka ha nọ ọdụ n'oche, ndị ọgaranya na-enwe mmasị inwe mmemme oriri ebe ha ga-eri nke ha n'ezumike.

English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ndị a na atụrụ ụtụ nwere ike iziga ndị nnọchiteanya ka ha gbaa ama ihe nile mere. Na mgbede, ndị ọrụ efu ga agụkọ ụtụ nile na oke nlegideanya , ma site n'usoro atọrọ atọ.
predictions: Ndị na-azọ ọkwa nwere ike izipu ndị nnọchiteanya ka ha soro na-ekiri akụkụ ọ bụla nke usoro ahụ. N'abalị, a na-agụpụta vootu site n'aka ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo n'okpuru nlekọta siri ike, na-agbaso usoro a kapịrị ọnụ.

English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Igbo: Oburu na imaatachabeghi ka esi anya ugboala n’okporouzo ime obodo, ume ahapukwala gi: uzo n’akpode akpode, uzo di wara wara na nkuku nko juru eju.
English: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
Igbo: Izmir bụ obodo nke atọ kacha buo ibu na mba Tọkị nwere ọnụọgụgụ ndị mmadụ dị ihe dịka nde 3. 7, ọdụ ụgbọmmiri nke abụọ kacha buo ibu ma a gụpụ Istanbulu, na ọdụ ụgbọ njem dị ezigbo mma.
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Igbo: Ụmụ Kọmetị nwere ike ịbụ isi mmalite nnefe mmiri nye ụwa ya na ihe dị ndụ nwere ike ịmepụta ụmụ protiin ma kwado ndụ.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Igbo: Adekọya anọrọla n'Ụlọ ikpe Obodo Edịnbọg ebe eboro ya ebubo maka igbu nwa ya nwoke.
English: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
Igbo: Pa amb Oli bụ nri abalị dị mfe nke amaara ọkachasị n'oge sọma: Achịcha na mmanụ oliv, tomato, na ụmụ orishirishi ndị ọzọ dị adị dịka chiizi, azụ tuna, dzg.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
Igbo:"}]
label: Ụfọdụ ebe mgbakọ na-enye ụmụ ihe ọn̄ụn̄ụ na-eme n'anya n'efu. Mana, mmanya ogbugbu na-egbochi echiche, ma ndị nille na-agba chaa chaa nke ọma mara mkpa nke ọ dị ịnọ n'ezi echiche.
predictions: Ụfọdụ ebe ntụrụndụ na-enye ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya n'efu. Otú ọ dị, mmanya na-ebelata ikike ịkpa ókè, ma ndị niile na-egwu chaa chaa nke ọma maara mkpa ọ dị ịnọgide na-enwe uchu.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
Igbo: Hamilton kwetere na Ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum Howard nabatara onye ọrịa ahụ n’ọnọdụ ahụ kwụsiri ike
English: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.
Igbo: N'afọ 2002, ebibiri Goma site n’aka lava si na ugwu ọkụ Nyiragongo nke liri ọtụtụ n'okporoama obodo, ọ kachasị etiti obodo.
English: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"
Igbo: N’ihi mkọkụlọta/òtù agwaetiti ahụ Japan nwere, a na-arụnyekarị Japan aka, n’elu etu ala ndị ahụ sị guzogide, dị ka "archipelago"
English: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
Igbo: Ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ukwu nke mba Itali, ya na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ukw nke mba Jamani bu ndị kacha eme nke ọma n'otu bọọlụ ukwu na mbaụwa ma bụrụkwa ndị nwetara mmeri n’iko mbaụwa nke afo 2006.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Igbo: Ụmụ onyinyo infràreèd na-egosipụta na mgbanwe okpomọkụ ahụ sitere n'ụbọchị na abalị na-egosi na ha nwere ike ịbụ ọgba.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
Igbo:'}]
label: Onye ọ bụla nke na-aga ịnya ụgbọ ala ya elu latitude maọbụ n’elu ugwu gafere, kwesịrị ịtụle ihe enwere ike ịbụ oge snow, ice, ma ọ bụ oke oyi.
predictions: Onye ọ bụla ga-anya ụgbọ ala n'ọkwa dị elu ma ọ bụ gafee ụzọ ugwu kwesịrị ịtụle ohere nke ịdaba na snow, ice, ma ọ bụ okpomọkụ na-agbaze.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

English: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
Igbo: Ke,gbe mbịarute nke mmadụ na Galapagos, ewebatala ọtụtụ anụ na-an̄ụ ara gụnyere ewu, inyinya, ehi, oke, nwamba na nkịta.

Igbo: Egwuregwu oge oyi kachasị ewu ewu n'ugwu, ebe ndị mba Italy so asọ mpi n'egwuregwu mba na mba makwa na Olimpik.
English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
Igbo: Ihe ọmụmụ na-abụkarị site na ụbọchị abuo ruo ụbọchị ise ma ọ ga-emetụta mmepụta omume, ọtụtụ mgbata ọsọ enyemaka mbụ na ọzụzụ maka ngwaagha n'oge ụfọdụ .
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Igbo: Mpaghara Chako bụ ụlọ nye ụfọdụ agbụrụ amaala ndị ọzọ dịka Guaykuru na Payagua, ndị ji nta, ntụtụkọ, na ịkụ azụ wee zụọ onwe ha nri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

label: N’okporo ụzọ ebe ais na sno dị, nrapara dị ala nakwa ịnweghị ike ịnya moto n'elu ya dịka ị nọ na asfalt nkịtị.
predictions: Na ụzọ awara awara nke oyi kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ na nke snow kpuchiri, esemokwu adịghị elu na ị gaghị enwe ike ịnya ụgbọala dịka ị ga-asị na ị nọ n'elu asfalt a na-ahụ anya.

predictions: N'oge oké ifufe snow, snow zuru ezu iji mee ka ị kwụrụ nwere ike ịda n'oge na-adịghị anya.

English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Igbo: Ndagwurugwuru Cochamó - ebe arimelu nwere ogo kachasị elu nke Chile, a mara dị ka Yosemite nke Ndịda Amerịka, ya na ụdị dị iche iche nke ụmụ nnukwu ahụaja kọnkịrị na nnukwu nkume.

English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
Igbo: Na ndabere nke ụlọ ọrụ nuklia Japan, a chọpụtawo n'ụlọ mmepụta cesium na ayodiin dị redioaktivu.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Igbo translation, please provide the Igbo translation for these sentences:
English: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
Igbo: Gịnị mere sistemụ njem ji akpata ụdịrị ụmụ mkpesa ahụ, gịmị mere ha ji ada kwa ụbọchị? Ọ bụ na ndị injinịa njem amaghị arụ ọrụ ha nke ọma? Ma ọ bụ ihe ọzọ si n'isi na-eme?
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Igbo: Anyị ga-agba mbọ belata ikuku kabon dioxide kwa nke Mkpokọta ihe nrụpụta obodo site na oke 2020 site n'ọkwa 2005, Hu kwuru.
English: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
Igbo: Cheta na obu ezie na egwu ogbo-egwu nwere ike gwula, enwere ike inwe mpaghara mmeme ahu gana aku egwu ruo ime abali.

Igbo: Tupu ulo-oru obula enwee ike idi n’eweputa uche-ohuru, nduzi aghaghi ikepuya omenala uche-ohuu dika kwa nkerita nghota na imu ihe nke ulo-oru.

predictions: Njem nleta Safari bụ ikekwe ihe kachasị adọta ndị njem n'ime Africa na ihe kacha mma maka ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa.

English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Igbo: Ndị nchọcha sitere na Mahadum Princeton dị na mba Amerịka na Mahadum Uppsala dị na mba Sweden kọwara ụdịdị ọhụrụ pụtara na naanị ọgbọ abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na ụkpụrụ a ka e chere na ọ na-ewe oge karịa, n'ihi ọmụmụ n’etiti otu ụdị nnụnụ bụ Dawin Finchi na-ebi otu ebe, Jiospiza Fọtisi, nakwa Kakụtus Finchi si esi bata, Jiospiza konirostrisi.
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
Igbo: Ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na anọ na Hawaii ndị nọ na ma ọ bụ na nso akụkụ mmiri bụ ndị e mechiri na Wenezdee niile na-agbanyeghị ndọ aka na ntị niile ewepụrụ.

Igbo: Agbanyeghị na ọrụrụ-piramidi n’okwute gara n’ihu ruo na njedebe nke Alaeze Ochie, ụmụ piramidi nke Giza bụ ndị agafeghị ma ọlị na nha ha na ima mma nka na ụzụ nke ọrụrụ ha.
